channel.title: Saving games?
channel.description:
[b][u] Ok, when i log onto my server and play for a while then logg off then try to log back on my game is not saved! What can i do about this? THis just started happening today, and everything was working fine yesterday! So can anyone help me?
my source is svenscap3!
thank you! [/u][/b]

item.title: Saving games?
item.dc:creator: @Symbiode Symbiode
item.description:
@Symbiode wrote:

try checking your voids that are enacted when you logout, maybe you could have accidentally edited a wrong part, or one thing that happened to me is changed file permission, make sure your folder with your character files are not write protected

Read full topic
